channel.title: World2pk ~ New rsps ~ Old school 317 revision~ 24/7 ~ Hamachi server!
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Welcome to World2pk 317![/size][/center]
[center][URL=http://s04.flagcounter.com/more/hdc][IMG]http://s04.flagcounter.com/mini/hdc/bg_000000/txt_FFFFFF/border_FFFFFF/flags_0/[/img][/URL][/center] [center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/91526169/home.png[/img] [url=http://www.world2pk.enjin.com]Website[/url][/center] [center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/91526169/Forum.png[/img] [url=http://www.world2pk.enjin.com/forum]Forum[/url][/center] [center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/91526169/Play.png[/img] [url=http://www.rswebclients.com/play/World2Pk]Webclient[/url][/center] [center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/91526169/Play.png[/img] [url=http://uppit.com/eqjbvfo9zhvp/World2PkCleint_v2.rar]Jar Client[/url][/center]
[center]World2pk, what is so different? Well... Our coder is on the server working with the community non-stop, need something added? Tell the coder and he'll work on it straight after he is finished working on whatever he is working on! Everything requested by players (which is reasonable) is added, it's a community based server.[/center]
[center]Server Stats: 24/7 with staff support Really great staff members Staff is handled just like RuneScape staff! Gold = Work for server, Silver = Player Moderator! Stable economy with reasonable players
Server benefits: 100% P.V.P and perfect switching 100% Magic system 100% Skilling system 100% Combat system 100% Slayer with reward shop! Quick~ish combat XP rates
Bosses: Nex || Torva || Pernix || Virtus || Zaryte Bow- Bandos || Saradomin || Zamorak - Armadly || Tormented Demons || Corperal Beast -
MiniGames: Duel Arena Barrows warriors guild tzhaar pest conrtol
Server Details: The server is on Hamachi at this movement. for more detials please go to our website [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/91526169/home.png[/img] [url=http://www.world2pk.enjin.com]Website[/url]
The networks are : World2Pk3
Password is : 1234
Old school Active players Paid forums - Great Auto-donation shop 100% Trading working NPCs Chaotics Active Pking Working dung ALOT MORE..
[center]Home of World2pk![center] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/250t8gn.jpg[/img]
[center]Monster teleport![center] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/qn1y6h.jpg[/img]
[center]Minigames teleport![center] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ns3tia.jpg[/img]
[center]Boss teleport![center] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/13ygsgm.jpg[/img]
[center]P'king teleport![center] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/4lfsbq.jpg[/img]
[center]Every skill working![center] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ilb0py.jpg[/img]
JOIN TODAY! :D[/center]
